author: barnabasbusa
content:
Quick recap of the general timeline for dencun-devnet-8 that we have discussed yesterday on the meeting:
* Spec clarification by Thu 27th Jul (https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/dencun-devnet-8)
* client releases for devnet-8 spec by Sun 30th Jul
* Hive tests on Mon/Tue 31stJul /1st Aug <@892053833121923094> 
* If we get enough hive passes by tuesday afternoon, launch devnet 8 on Wednesday morning
* Once devnet-8 is considered stable, we shut down devnet-7 Wednesday afternoon.

author: barnabasbusa
content: Is this timeline suitable for clients, testing teams?

author: terence0083
content: If we were to finalize spec by 27th,, client release on 30th is too rush unless clients want to work over time over the weekend. I'd suggest client release by Tuesday Aug 1st and hive tests Thursday Aug3rd and devnet8 the Friday or monday after

content: I suppose this PR will also make it to devnet8? https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3461

content: An extra couple of days to get the hive tests ready would be nice  ğŸ™
